chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
smspi: state_machine_safety'interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
pllsi: prevLog_leader_sublog_interface
ctgt0: current_term_gt_zero_interface
lalcii: lastApplied_le_commitIndex_interface
miaei: match_index_all_entries_interface
lhlli: leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface
lci: leader_completeness_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
glci: ghost_log_correct_interface
lphogli: log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface
glemi: ghost_log_entries_match_interface
tci: transitive_commit_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
rmri: raft_msg_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall (h : Net.name) (net : network), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> (forall e : entry, In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> committed net e (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)))) -> forall e : entry, In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= commitIndex (advanceCommitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) h) -> committed net e (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)))

Premises:
Notation type := (RaftState.type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_Single
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Notation commitIndex := (RaftState.commitIndex term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
committed = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (e : entry) (t : term) => exists (h : Net.name) (e' : entry), eTerm e' <= t /\ directly_committed net e' /\ eIndex e <= eIndex e' /\ In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) /\ In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_re
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
advanceCommitIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : raft_data) (me : name) => let entriesToCommit := filter (fun e : entry => (currentTerm state =? eTerm e) && (commitIndex state <? eIndex e) && haveQuorum state me (eIndex e)) (findGtIndex (log state) (commitIndex state)) in RaftState.set_raft_data_commitIndex term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state (fold_left Init.Nat.max (map eIndex entriesToCommit) (commitIndex state)) :
commit_invariant_host = fun net : ghost_log_network => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> lifted_committed net e (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : ghost_log_network -> Prop
commit_recorded_lift_intro : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost net) h e
msg_commit_recorded_lift_intro : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) h e
haveQuorum_directly_committed : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> haveQuorum (snd (nwState net h)) h (eIndex e) = true -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) -> directly_committed net e
leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader ->...-> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
committed_log_allEntries_preserved : forall (net net' : network) (e : entry) (t : term), committed net e t -> (forall (h : Net.name) (e' : entry), In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net' h)))) -> (forall (h : Net.name) (e' : entry) (t' : term), In (t', e') (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t', e') (allEntries (fst (nwState net' h)))) -> committed net' e t
lifted_transitive_commit_invariant : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e e' : entry) (t : term), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= eIndex e' -> lifted_committed net e' t -> lifted_committed net e t
transitive_commit = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e e' : entry) (t : term), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= eIndex e' -> committed net e' t -> committed net e t : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments transitive_commit {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_no_entries_past_current_term_host = fun net : network => forall (h : name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eTerm e <= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) : network -> Prop
lift_max_index_sanity : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) -> lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) /\ commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h)))
match_index_all_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (e : entry) (leader : Net.name) (h : name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> eIndex e <= assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (snd (nwState net leader))) h 0 -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) ->...-> Prop Arguments match_index_all_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_committed = fun (net : ghost_log_network) (e : entry) (t : term) => exists (h : Net.name) (e' : entry), eTerm e' <= t /\ lifted_directly_committed net e' /\ eIndex e <= eIndex e' /\ In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) /\ In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) : ghost_log_network -> entry -> term -> Prop
lifted_maxIndex_sanity = fun net : ghost_log_network => (forall h : Net.name, lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h)))) /\ (forall h : Net.name, commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h)))) : ghost_log_network -> Prop
lifted_committed_log_allEntries_preserved : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (net' : network) (e : entry) (t : term), lifted_committed net e t -> (forall (h : Net.name) (e' : entry), In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net' h)))) -> (forall (h : Net.name) (e' : entry) (t' : term), In (t', e') (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t', e') (allEntries (fst (nwState net' h)))) -> lifted_committed net' e t
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
msg_lifted_lastApplied_le_commitIndex : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h))
entries_match_nw_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (e e' e'' : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' ->...-> Prop Arguments entries_match_nw_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaders_have_leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> exists ll : list entry, In (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)), ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_recorded_committed = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), commit_recorded (deghost net) h e -> committed net e (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded_committed {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface : (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0 net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted net) ->...-> refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
leader_sublog_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) -> In e (log (nwState net leader)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_host_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_gt_0 = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0 {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_sms_nw : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), state_machine_safety (deghost net) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> t >= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost net) h e -> prevLogIndex > eIndex e \/ prevLogIndex = eIndex e /\ prevLogTerm = eTerm e \/ eIndex e > maxIndex entries \/ In e entries
msg_lifted_sms_nw : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), state_machine_safety (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> t >= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) ->...-> prevLogIndex > eIndex e \/ prevLogIndex = eIndex e /\ prevLogTerm = eTerm e \/ eIndex e > maxIndex entries \/ In e entries
entries_match_invariant : forall (net : network) (h h' : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h')))
Record refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface { entries_contiguous_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net; entries_gt_0_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> eIndex e > 0 } Arguments refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
allEntries_gt_0_invariant : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eIndex e > 0
lifted_prevLog_leader_sublog = fun net : network => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) = prevLogTerm -> 0 < prevLogIndex -> 0 < prevLogTerm -> exists ple : entry, eIndex ple = prevLogIndex /\ eTerm ple = prevLogTerm /\ In ple (log (snd (nwState net leader))) : network -> Prop
directly_committed_allEntries_preserved : forall (net net' : network) (e : entry), directly_committed net e -> (forall h : Net.name, In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net' h)))) -> directly_committed net' e
update_elections_data_client_request_allEntries : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h (snd st) client id c = (out, st', ms) -> allEntries (update_elections_data_client_request h st client id c) = allEntries (fst st) \/ (exists e : entry, eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log (snd st))) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm (snd st) /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type (snd st) = Leader /\ allEntries (update_elections_data_client_request h st client...
